fn.p: Competing Interests: We have the following interests: The study was supported in part by the following grant Danone 30000221. In addition to funding, Danone Nutricia Research made available Lactobacilli strains and performed Microbiota analysis. MD and RBS are Danone Nutricia Research employees. There are no patents, products in development or marketed products to declare. This does not alter our adherence to all the PLOS ONE policies on sharing data and materials.
